about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate developer with over 9 years of experience, having worked on high-impact projects across Brazil and Latin America.
about.paragraph2: Throughout my journey, I've built robust solutions using React, TypeScript, and Node.js â€” contributing to fintechs, white-label platforms, and large-scale enterprises. I've worked as a Full Stack, Mobile, and currently as a Frontend Engineer, always focused on clean, performant, and accessible code.
about.paragraph3: Collaborating with international teams has given me a global product mindset and strong multicultural communication skills in English and Spanish.
about.paragraph4: Beyond work, I build personal projects like WebDevTools and maintain a blog where I share insights about career, software architecture, and technology. My goal is to keep growing, contributing to the community, and building experiences that matter.
